dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT PHA.SEGMENT1 PO_NUMBER, PHA.PO_HEADER_ID HDR_ID, PHA.CREATION_DATE ORDER_DATE, PHA.REVISION_NUM REVISION_NUMBER, PHA.LAST_UPDATE_DATE REVISION_DATE, PAPF.FULL_NAME CREATED_BY, PAPF2.FULL_NAME REVISED_BY, PHA.NOTE_TO_VENDOR PO_NOTES, APS.SEGMENT1 VENDOR_NUMBER, APS.VENDOR_NAME VENDOR_LOC, ASSA.ADDRESS_LINE1 || ASSA.ADDRESS_LINE2|| ASSA.ADDRESS_LINE3 VENOR_ROAD, APC.FIRST_NAME || ' ' || APC.LAST_NAME VENDOR_CONTACT, ASSA.CITY|| ', '|| ASSA.STATE|| ' ' || ASSA.ZIP VENDOR_CODE, APC.PHONE VENDOR_CONTACT_PHONE, APT.NAME PAYMENT_TERMS, PLC_FC.DISPLAYED_FIELD FREIGHT_TERMS, PHA.FOB_LOOKUP_CODE FOB, PHA.SHIP_VIA_LOOKUP_CODE SHIP_VIA, NULL RECEIVING_CONTACT , HLA.DESCRIPTION SHIP_LOC, HLA.ADDRESS_LINE_1 SHIP_ROAD, HLA.TOWN_OR_CITY || ', ' || HLA.COUNTRY || ' ' || HLA.POSTAL_CODE SHIP_CODE, HLA2.DESCRIPTION BILL_LOC, HLA2.ADDRESS_LINE_1 BILL_ROAD, HLA2.TOWN_OR_CITY || ', ' || HLA2.COUNTRY || ' ' || HLA2.POSTAL_CODE BILL_CODE, RSL.DELIVER_TO_PERSON_ID, RSH.CUSTOMER_ID, RSH.EMPLOYEE_ID FROM PO_HEADERS_ALL PHA, FND_USER FU1, FND_USER FU2, AP_SUPPLIERS APS, AP_SUPPLIER_SITES_ALL ASSA, AP_TERMS APT, AP_SUPPLIER_CONTACTS APC, PO_LOOKUP_CODES PLC_FC, HR_LOCATIONS_ALL HLA, HR_LOCATIONS_ALL HLA2, RCV_SHIPMENT_HEADERS RSH, RCV_SHIPMENT_LINES RSL, PO_HEADERS_ARCHIVE_ALL PHAA, PER_ALL_PEOPLE_F PAPF2, PER_ALL_PEOPLE_F PAPF WHERE PHA.CREATED_BY = FU1.USER_ID AND PAPF.PERSON_ID = FU1.EMPLOYEE_ID AND PHA.LAST_UPDATED_BY = FU2.USER_ID AND PHA.VENDOR_ID = APS.VENDOR_ID AND PHA.VENDOR_SITE_ID = ASSA.VENDOR_SITE_ID AND ASSA.TERMS_ID = APT.TERM_ID AND PHA.VENDOR_CONTACT_ID = APC.VENDOR_CONTACT_ID AND PHA.SHIP_TO_LOCATION_ID = HLA.LOCATION_ID AND PHA.BILL_TO_LOCATION_ID = HLA2.LOCATION_ID AND PHA.FREIGHT_TERMS_LOOKUP_CODE = PLC_FC.LOOKUP_CODE AND RSL.PO_HEADER_ID = PHA.PO_HEADER_ID AND RSL.SHIPMENT_HEADER_ID = RSH.SHIPMENT_HEADER_ID AND PHA.PO_HEADER_ID = PHAA.PO_HEADER_ID AND PHA.REVISION_NUM = PHAA.REVISION_NUM AND SYSDATE BETWEEN PAPF.EFFECTIVE_START_DATE AND NVL (PAPF.EFFECTIVE_END_DATE, TRUNC (SYSDATE) + 1) AND (PAPF.CURRENT_EMPLOYEE_FLAG = 'Y' OR PAPF.CURRENT_NPW_FLAG = 'Y') AND SYSDATE BETWEEN PAPF2.EFFECTIVE_START_DATE AND NVL (PAPF2.EFFECTIVE_END_DATE, TRUNC (SYSDATE) + 1) AND (PAPF2.CURRENT_EMPLOYEE_FLAG = 'Y' OR PAPF2.CURRENT_NPW_FLAG = 'Y') AND PHAA.AGENT_ID = PAPF2.PERSON_ID AND PLC_FC.LOOKUP_TYPE = 'FREIGHT TERMS' --AND PHA.ORG_ID = 204 AND PHA.SEGMENT1 = '3062'

SELECT PLA.PO_LINE_ID, PLA.PO_HEADER_ID, PLA.LINE_TYPE_ID, PLA.LINE_NUM, MSIB.SEGMENT1 PART_NUM, MSIB.DESCRIPTION PART_DESC, PLA.UNIT_MEAS_LOOKUP_CODE, PLA.ITEM_ID, PLA.CATEGORY_ID, PLA.ITEM_DESCRIPTION, PLA.UNIT_PRICE, PLA.QUANTITY, PLA.UNIT_PRICE * PLA.QUANTITY AMOUNT, RSH.SHIPPED_DATE FROM PO_LINES_ALL PLA, PO_HEADERS_ALL PHA, MTL_SYSTEM_ITEMS_B MSIB, MTL_CATEGORIES MC, PO_LINE_TYPES MLT, ORG_ORGANIZATION_DEFINITIONS OOD, PO_LINE_LOCATIONS_ALL PLLA, RCV_SHIPMENT_HEADERS RSH, RCV_SHIPMENT_LINES RSL WHERE 1=1 AND PLA.PO_HEADER_ID = PHA.PO_HEADER_ID AND MSIB.INVENTORY_ITEM_ID = PLA.ITEM_ID AND MC.CATEGORY_ID = PLA.CATEGORY_ID AND MLT.LINE_TYPE_ID = PLA.LINE_TYPE_ID AND OOD.ORGANIZATION_ID = MSIB.ORGANIZATION_ID AND PLLA.PO_LINE_ID = PLA.PO_LINE_ID AND PLLA.SHIP_TO_ORGANIZATION_ID = MSIB.ORGANIZATION_ID AND OOD.ORGANIZATION_ID = MSIB.ORGANIZATION_ID AND RSL.PO_HEADER_ID = PHA.PO_HEADER_ID AND RSL.SHIPMENT_HEADER_ID = RSH.SHIPMENT_HEADER_ID AND PHA.PO_HEADER_ID = :HDR_ID
